poems.title: First Fig
Trees
Risk
poems.content:
And then the day came, 
when the risk 
to remain tight 
in a bud 
was more painful 
than the risk 
it took 
to Blossom.

poems.title: The Dust of Snow
poems.content:
The way a crow 
Shook down on me 
The dust of snow 
From a hemlock tree
Has given my heart 
A change of mood 
And saved some part 
Of a day I had rued.

poems.title: The Purple Cow
poems.content:
I never saw a Purple Cow, 
I never hope to see one, 
But I can tell you, anyhow, 
I’d rather see than be one!
